channel.title: How do I send username and password input to an e-mail?
channel.description: This is phishing related. Don't worry, I'm not a scammer or anything, just educational purposes and experimentations. If I had a login form like this: http://www.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/loginform.ws?mod=forum&dest=index.html in html on my desktop, how can I edit the code to make it send the password and username to a selected email?

item.title: How do I send username and password input to an e-mail?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Learn PHP. After you learn syntax, learn POST, then mail. http://www.w3schools.com/php/php_mail.asp

Read full topic
